billhistory.caption: Relating to the powers and duties of the Hidalgo County Water Control and Improvement District No. 18; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose fees and taxes.

subjects.subject: HIDALGO COUNTY WATER CONTROL AND IMPROVEMENT DISTRICT NO. 18 (D1290)
Special Districts & Authorities--Water & Utility (I0755)
Special Districts & Authorities--Water Control Improve Dist. (I0012)

action.description: Received by the Secretary of the Senate
